title: Was Umar bin Khatab impressed by an ayah in Surah Haqqah that led him to accept Islam?
transcript: noor says there is uh an ayah in surah which influenced me allah be pleased with him to accept islam and he heard this from beyond or behind the curtain near the kaaba when the prophet was reciting this i don't know anything authentic about such a story to my the to the best of my knowledge so i don't believe that this is true at all
